title: Triumph for Inspector West
description: Chief Inspector Roger West has been watching and waiting for over two years â€“ he is determined to catch Paul Raeburn out. The millionaire racketeer may have made a mistake, following the killing of a small time crook. Can the ace detective triumph over the evil Raeburn in what are very difficult circumstances? This cannot be assumed as not everything, it would seem, is as simple as it first appears ...
author: John Creasey
